name: Ecu Remapping Performance Calculator
author: Arrow Design

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Click on the ‘Setting’ option and then click on ‘Ecu Remapping Performance Calculator’.
sections.description: This plugin allows you to calculate the performance gains of remapping an ECU. Allow website users to choose their vehicle type, engine type, make/model and gain estimations of perfomance gains from remapping their ECU. This plugin is relying on a 3rd party as a service i.e. it has Third-Party Service Integration, operated by the plugin developer, ArrowDesign.ie Our plugin integrates with our third-party service hosted on arrowdesign.ie. This integration is essential for validating users and managing premium subscriptions for our users. Purpose of Integration and outputting of results. 1. User Validation: To confirm whether a user has signed up for premium access to our plugin. 2. Subscription Check: To verify if premium users’ subscriptions are active and within the valid 365-day period from the date of purchase. 3. To provide data relating to the ecu remapping calculations. Data Transmission When the plugin connects to arrowdesign.ie, it transmits user data necessary for the validation process. This includes the user’s subscription status and the date of subscription. No personal data beyond what is necessary for validation is transmitted. User Consent and Privacy Users are required to consent to this data transmission as a part of the plugin setup. Our commitment to user privacy is detailed in our Privacy Policy found here: https://arrowdesign.ie/ecu-mapping-calculator-privacy-policy/ Terms of Use Please review the Terms of Use for arrowdesign.ie to understand the conditions under which our service operates. The Terms Of Use of this plugin can be found here: https://arrowdesign.ie/ecu-mapping-calculator-terms-of-use/. Contact Information For any queries or concerns regarding the integration with arrowdesign.ie, please contact us at info@arrowdesign.ie.
